title: 020 - Gumpy Calls In From Quarantine Up North
description: On today's show, Gump FaceTimes in to let the guys know how things are going up north in Canada and he relives his harrowing journey out of the country getting back into Canada. The guys also discuss the championship game of the March Sadness bracket, which opens for voting today with a match of two colossal titans: a dog dying vs. SDDEO. The guys also chat about Kendrick Perkins' sons racking up $16,000 in Fortnite charges on his credit card bill, fortune cookie companies trying to help out first responders, and the fellas from The Pub officially finding The Pub 2.0. Stay safe this weekend, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
